title: Vel'Koz body invisible in spectator with new Arclight Vel’Koz
body: Occasionally when I was spectating my friends game Arclight Vel’Koz body would disappear. After re-watching the game I couldn't find what causes this since it doesn't seem to be easily reproducible. It happened 4 times on both play thoughts of the replay although not at the same times as before. Note this was all in the official spectator mode and not a third party replay software.

replies.body:
Hey Soul Relay, 

Thanks for the report! 

Would you mind attaching your DXDiag? DX Diags can be found by typing "DX Diag" into the start menu search bar. 

In addition, can you see Arclight Vel'Koz normally in games? Did this specifically occur in Spectator?

Thanks!

There you go. Attached should be the file you need.

I personally haven't seen Arclight Vel'Koz in game, but my friend over skype told me he saw no visual problems with the skin. It seems to be either a fault of my system or spectator mode, or both perhaps.
